quote.issuer_name: Minieye Technology Co., Ltd - H Shares
quote.nm: Minieye Technology Co., Ltd - H Shares
quote.summary: Minieye Technology Co Ltd, formerly Shenzhen Minieye Technology Co Ltd, is a China-based company mainly engaged in the development, production and sales of intelligent driving products and solutions. The Company mainly provides solutions for the driving experience, including navigation, parking and in-cabin functions. The Company is mainly engaged in four businesses. The intelligent driving solutions business mainly provides iSafety and iPilot solutions and other intelligent driving solution-related services. The intelligent cabin solutions business mainly includes driver monitoring system (DMS) solutions, passenger monitoring system (OMS) solutions and other solutions. The vehicle infrastructure cooperative systems business manages traffic flows in industry parks and parking slots for customers. The other businesses is mainly engaged in the sales of spare parts and the provision of maintenance services.
